entities.name: narcissa
entities.description: Narcissa is mentioned as someone who is sobbing and trying to persuade Severus Snape. She is described as saying 'But he won't succeed!' and 'I beg you...'.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as gasping in response to Narcissa's words.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is mentioned as someone who is being addressed by Narcissa and is described as 'Draco's favourite teacher' and 'the Dark Lord's favourite, his most trusted advisor'. He is also said to be 'not stupid enough to attempt' persuading the Dark Lord.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as someone who has a favourite teacher in Severus Snape.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: Lucius is mentioned as someone who was supposed to be in charge and got himself captured. He is also described as an old friend of Severus Snape's.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as a title held by someone who will not be persuaded and is angry with Lucius.

relationships.description: Narcissa is pleading for Severus Snape's help in persuading the Dark Lord.
Bellatrix responds to Narcissa's words with a gasp.
Severus Snape is described as the Dark Lord's favourite, his most trusted advisor.
The Dark Lord is angry with Lucius.
